meta.goal: User wants to drink an espresso

controllers.name: SystemControlManager
controllers.description: Manages system control operations: schedule() in B1

controllers.name: WaterLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages water (liquid state): heat() in B2a

controllers.name: CoffeeSolidManager
controllers.description: Manages coffee (solid state): grind() in B2c

controllers.name: CoffeeLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages coffee (liquid state): brew() in B3a

controllers.name: MilkLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages milk (liquid state): add() in B3b

controllers.name: HMIManager
controllers.description: Manages hmi transactions: output() in B4

controllers.name: SugarSolidManager
controllers.description: Manages sugar (solid state): add() in E1.1

boundaries.name: CoffeeBeansSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for CoffeeBeans supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: TimingBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for time-based system scheduling and triggers

boundaries.name: MessageDisplayBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for displaying messages to user

boundaries.name: ProductDeliveryBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for delivering products to user
